title: Component Registry & Metadata
description: Registry system for shared components with metadata, header comment enforcement, and disk-based indexing

requirements.title: Component Registry with Metadata
requirements.description: Maintain registry of shared components with ID, name, description, tags, version, file path, and tech stack
notes: Registry should support query by ID, name, tags, category
Metadata should be indexed from header comments
Database stores indexed metadata for performance

requirements.title: Header Comment Enforcement
requirements.description: Enforce standardized header comment block in all library components containing metadata and adoption tracking info
notes: Header must include: libraryId, displayName, description, version, sourcePath, warning
Validation should prevent saving components without proper header

requirements.title: Component Indexing from Disk
requirements.description: Re-index library components from disk using header comment metadata without DB-only reliance
notes: File system is source of truth
Indexing should parse header comments from all component files
libraryId uniqueness must be enforced during indexing
